name: Hello Kitty Tutu Set . Brite Pink . Lite Pink . White
description:
BODYSUIT
Cotton Spandex (pictured) Short Sleeve Leotard
CUSTOM INSCRIPTION AVAILABLE ON BODYSUIT
or
ONESIE
100% Cotton Onesie (not pictured) lap shoulder snap crotch
CUSTOM INSCRIPTION AVAILABLE ON ONESIE
Please message me with Desired Custom Inscription for top
Due to the CUSTOM nature of this order - there are absolutely NO RETURNS

TUTU
9 Layers of Super Soft Poly Mesh
Dyed to Match Satin Covered Elastic Waistband
Super Soft - Not Scratchy
Silk Flower and Ribbon Waist Corsage on Pin for easy Removal
Matching Crochet Headband with Silk Flower and Ribbon Hair Accessory on Clip for Easy Removal

BE SURE TO CHECK MEASUREMENTS FOR PROPER FIT
Ages are approximate and are to be used as a guide only
Top measurements are relaxed NOT stretched
Please double check measurements for size accuracy

SIZING
ONESIE and TUTU SIZING
Waist measurement is all around
NEWBORN:CHEST 15"/NECK TO CROTCH 14" /SK WAIST 16"-26" /SK LENGTH 6 - 7"
3M: CHEST 16" / NECK TO CROTCH 15" / SK WAIST 16"-26" / SK LENGTH 6 - 7"
6M: CHEST 18" / NECK TO CROTCH 16" / SK WAIST 16"-26" / SK LENGTH 6 - 7"
9M: CHEST 19" / NECK TO CROTCH 17" / SK WAIST 16"-26" / SK LENGTH 6 - 7"
12M: CHEST 20" / NECK TO CROTCH 18" / SK WAIST 16"-26" / SK LENGTH 7 - 8"
18M: CHEST 22" / NECK TO CROTCH 19" / SK WAIST 16"-26" / SK LENGTH 7 - 8"
24M: CHEST 24" / NECK TO CROTCH 20" / SK WAIST 16"-26" / SK LENGTH 8 - 9"

OR

BODYSUIT and TUTU SET SIZING
Waist measurement is all around
S: 18M-24M:CHEST 22"/NECK TO CROTCH 14"/SK WAIST 16"-26 /SK LENGTH 7 - 8"
M:2T-4T:CHEST 24"/NECK TO CROTCH 16 /SK WAIST 16"-26 /SK LENGTH 8 - 9"
L:4-6X: CHEST 26"/ NECK TO CROTCH 18" / SK WAIST 16"-26" / SK LENGTH 9-10
XL:7-8yrs: CHEST 28"/NECK TO CROTCH 20"/SK WAIST 16"-26"/SK LENGTH 10- 11"
XXL:9-10yr:CHEST 30"/NECK TO CROTCH 22"/SK WAIST 16"-26 /SK LENGTH 11-12"

PLEASE MESSAGE ME WITH YOUR DESIGN REQUEST IF DIFFERENT FROM THE LISTING
and
ANY PERSONALIZED MESSAGE YOU WOULD LIKE FOR THE FRONT OF YOUR TOP

name: USC TROJANS . CHEERLEADER TUTU SET
description:
TEAM SPIRIT CHEERLEADER INSPIRED TUTU SET with BODYSUIT or ONESIE

MADE TO MATCH CHEERLEADER TUTU SET
Please contact me for all Special Requests and Pricing
Send me your Tean Name, Team Colors, Childs Name and Hair Color
If you would like Custom Colors, don't be shy, just send me a message, there are tons of color combos to choose from.

TOP
COTTON SPANDEX SHORT SLEEVE BODYSUIT ( pictured)
or 100% COTTON ONESIE (not pictured) lap shoulder snap crotch
CUSTOM INSCRIPTION AVAILABLE ON TOP

TUTU
6 LAYERS SUPER SOFT TRIPLE LAYER MESH 
CONTRAST SATIN RIBBON at HEM and WAIST BOW
COVERED ELASTIC DYED TO MATCH SATIN WAISTBAND
SUPER SOFT NOT SCRATCHY

HEADBAND
1 1/2" CROCHET HEADBAND 
MATCHING LARGE SILK FLOWER  
HAIR CLIP ON BACK FOR EASY REMOVAL

ONESIE and TUTU SIZING
NEWBORN: CHEST 15" / NECK TO CROTCH 14" / SK WAIST 16"-26" / SK LENGTH 6 - 7"
3M: CHEST 16" / NECK TO CROTCH 15" / SK WAIST 16"-26" / SK LENGTH 6 - 7"
6M: CHEST 18" / NECK TO CROTCH 16" / SK WAIST 16"-26" / SK LENGTH 6 - 7"
9M: CHEST 19" / NECK TO CROTCH 17" / SK WAIST 16"-26" / SK LENGTH 6 - 7"
12M: CHEST 20" / NECK TO CROTCH 18" / SK WAIST 16"-26" / SK LENGTH 7 - 8"
18M: CHEST 22" / NECK TO CROTCH 19" / SK WAIST 16"-26" / SK LENGTH 7 - 8"
24M: CHEST 24" / NECK TO CROTCH 20" / SK WAIST 16"-26" / SK LENGTH 8 - 9"

LONG SLEEVE ONESIE
if you would like to upgrade your Onesie to a Log Sleeve, please click on this link to purchase the Long Sleeve UpGrade:


OR

BODYSUIT and TUTU SET SIZING
S: 18M - 24M: CHEST 22" / NECK TO CROTCH 14" / SK WAIST 16"-26" / SK LENGTH 7 - 8"
M: 2T - 4T: CHEST 24" / NECK TO CROTCH 16" / SK WAIST 16"-26" / SK LENGTH 8 - 9"
L: 4 - 6X: CHEST 26" / NECK TO CROTCH 18" / SK WAIST 16"-26" / SK LENGTH 9 - 10"
XL: 7 - 8yrs: CHEST 28" / NECK TO CROTCH 20" / SK WAIST 16"-26" / SK LENGTH 10 - 11"
XXL: 9 - 10yrs: CHEST 30" / NECK TO CROTCH 22" / SK WAIST 16"-26" / SK LENGTH 11 - 12"

*Top measurements are relaxed NOT stretched
*AGES are approx and should be used as a guide only
*Please double check measurements for size accuracy

PLEASE SPECIFY DESIRED SIZE WHEN ORDERING
PLEASE ALLOW AT LEAST 5-10 DAYS FOR PRODUCTION and AN ADDITIONAL 2-3 DAYS FOR USPS PRIORITY SHIPPING TIME

MADE TO MATCH PARTY THEME
Please contact me for all Special Requests and Pricing
Send me your Party Theme . Plate . Napkin . Special Character
If you would like Custom Colors, don't be shy, just send me a message, there are tons of color combos to choose from.

If you need your order in a hurry, 
please let me know and I will do my best to accommodate your needs

ALL ORDERS ARE SHIPPED USPS PRIORITY or USPS PRIORITY INTERNATIONAL
SHIPPED IN BOX TO PREVENT CRUSHING
